Desc.entry: Informal discussion group on a variety of novels. New members welcome.

ContactName.entry: Claire Tayler/Emma Bramwell, Library and Information Assistants

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon & Thurs 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-7pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (library opening times); Usually last Fri in the month 10.30-11.30am (reading group, please contact for details)
